translation: Now begins the description of the Boar Incarnation:

gurmukhi: ਦਯੋ ਬਾਂਟ ਮਦਿਯੰ ਅਮਦਿਯੰ ਭਗਵਾਨੰ ॥ ਗੲੇ ਠਾਮ ਠਾਮੰ ਸਭੈ ਦੇਵ ਦਾਨੰ ॥
transliteration: Dayo Baant Madiyan Amadiyan Bhagvaanan|| Gad Thaam Thaamannd Sabhai Dev Daanan||
translation: In this way, the god Vishnu distributed the honey and ambrosia; and all gods and demons went away to their places.

gurmukhi: ਪੁਨਰ ਦ੍ਰੋਹ ਬਢਯੋ ਸੁ ਅਾਪੰ ਮਝਾਰੰ ॥ ਭਜੇ ਦੇਵਤਾ ਦੲੀਤ ਜਿੱਤੇ ਜੁਝਾਰੰ ॥੧॥
transliteration: Pounar Drog Badhyo Su Aapan Majhaaran|| Bhaje Devtaa Daeet Jitte Jujhaaran||1||
translation: Again the enmity grew between both of them and the war was waged; in which the gods fled and could not withstand the demons.1.
Hiranayaksha and Hiranayakashipu, both the demon brothers,

gurmukhi: ਸਭੈ ਲੋਗ ਕੈ ਜੀਤ ਲੀਨੇ ਗਹੀਰੰ ॥
transliteration: Sabhai Log Kai Jeet Leene Gadderan||
translation: Conquered the tresures of the worlds;

gurmukhi: ਜਲੰ ਬਾ ਥਲੇਯੰ ਕੀਯੋ ਰਾਜ ਸਰਬੰ ॥
transliteration: Jalan Baa Thaleyan Keeyo Raaj Saraban||
translation: They ruled over all the places in water and on land;

gurmukhi: ਭੁਜਾ ਦੇਖ ਭਾਰੀ ਬਢਯੋ ਤਾਹਿ ਗਰਬੰ ॥੨॥
translation: And seeing their own great physical strength, their pride knew no bounds.2.

gurmukhi: ਚਹੈ ਜੁੱਧੁ ਮੋ ਸੋ ਕਰੇ ਅਾਨ ਕੋੳੂ ॥
transliteration: Chahai Juddh(u) Mo So Dare Aan Kooo||
translation: They wanted that some brave warriors may come forward to fight with them;

gurmukhi: ਬਲੀ ਹੋੲਿ ਵਾ ਸੋ ਭਿਰੇ ਅਾਨ ਸੋੳੂ ॥
transliteration: Balihaoe Vaa So Bhire Aan Sooo||
translation: But only he could march against them, who could be greatly stronger than them.

gurmukhi: ਚੜਯੋ ਮੇਰ ਸ੍ਰਿੰਗੰ ਪਗੰ ਗੁਸਟ ਸੰਗੰ ॥
transliteration: Chadyo Mer Sringadg Pagadg Goust Sanadg||
translation: They climbed to the top of the Sumeru mountain and with the blows of their maces,

gurmukhi: ਹਰੇ ਬੇਦ ਭੂਮੰ ਕੀੲੇ ਸਰਬ ਭੰਗੰ ॥੩॥
transliteration: Dare Bed Bhoojan Pagadg Goust Sanadg||
translation: They took away the Vedas and the earth forcibly and caused the destruction of all natural principles.3.
